data.eml:eml: Ommatoiulus malleatus n. sp., a new Tunisian millipede, with notes on the punicus species group of Ommatoiulus (Diplopoda, Julidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Akkari, Nesrine, Voigtländer, Karin (2007): Ommatoiulus malleatus n. sp., a new Tunisian millipede, with notes on the punicus species group of Ommatoiulus (Diplopoda, Julidae). Zootaxa 1400: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.175410
